content.question: The controversy over the power to forgive sins referred to in the passage contributed to which of the following results in Europe over the next century?

choices.label: Widespread rejection of organized religion by Europeans
Establishment of state-sponsored Catholic churches in most of Europe
Religious violence and the end of Catholic authority over much of the continent
Abandonment by the papacy of claims to spiritual authority over Christians

content.answer: Religious violence and the end of Catholic authority over much of the continent
